nodes.text: There existed a variant, the electrified net gun, which, when fired, launched an electrically charged stun net that could be used to render individuals unconscious. The Trandoshan hunter Lo-Taren used an electrified net gun to capture Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano during the Second Battle of Felucia.
Net-throwers could be used to capture Gwerax-hai on the world Veron. The criminal Val possessed a modified net-thrower that she used as a grapple gun.
